00031 
00035 #define NORMAL_CONTACT_AVERAGE 1
00036 
00037 #define CONTACT_DIFF_EPSILON 0.00001f
00038 
00041 class GIM_CONTACT
00042 {
00043 public:
00044     btVector3 m_point;
00045     btVector3 m_normal;
00046     btScalar m_depth;//Positive value indicates interpenetration
00047     btScalar m_distance;//Padding not for use
00048     int m_feature1;//Face number
00049     int m_feature2;//Face number
00050 public:
00051     GIM_CONTACT()
00052     {
00053     }
00054 
00055     GIM_CONTACT(const GIM_CONTACT & contact):
00056                                 m_point(contact.m_point),
00057                                 m_normal(contact.m_normal),
00058                                 m_depth(contact.m_depth),
00059                                 m_feature1(contact.m_feature1),
00060                                 m_feature2(contact.m_feature2)
00061     {
00062     }
00063 
00064     GIM_CONTACT(const btVector3 &point,const btVector3 & normal,
00065                                 btScalar depth, int feature1, int feature2):
00066                                 m_point(point),
00067                                 m_normal(normal),
00068                                 m_depth(depth),
00069                                 m_feature1(feature1),
00070                                 m_feature2(feature2)
00071     {
00072     }
00073 
00075     SIMD_FORCE_INLINE unsigned int calc_key_contact() const
00076     {
00077         int _coords[] = {
00078                 (int)(m_point[0]*1000.0f+1.0f),
00079                 (int)(m_point[1]*1333.0f),
00080                 (int)(m_point[2]*2133.0f+3.0f)};
00081                 unsigned int _hash=0;
00082                 unsigned int *_uitmp = (unsigned int *)(&_coords[0]);
00083                 _hash = *_uitmp;
00084                 _uitmp++;
00085                 _hash += (*_uitmp)<<4;
00086                 _uitmp++;
00087                 _hash += (*_uitmp)<<8;
00088                 return _hash;
00089     }
00090 
00091     SIMD_FORCE_INLINE void interpolate_normals( btVector3 * normals,int normal_count)
00092     {
00093         btVector3 vec_sum(m_normal);
00094                 for(int i=0;i<normal_count;i++)
00095                 {
00096                         vec_sum += normals[i];
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 btScalar vec_sum_len = vec_sum.length2();
00100                 if(vec_sum_len <CONTACT_DIFF_EPSILON) return;
00101 
00102                 //GIM_INV_SQRT(vec_sum_len,vec_sum_len); // 1/sqrt(vec_sum_len)
00103 
00104                 m_normal = vec_sum/btSqrt(vec_sum_len);
00105     }
00106 
00107 };
